sentences: Bryan Devendorf was raised in Cincinnati, Ohio.
He later noted, in 2010: "My wife keeps trying to get on me to start writing again, but I’m just too lazy.
"Bryan maintains an interest in golf: "I am a golfer.
I don't get to play very often, but my parents just moved down to North Carolina on a golf course, so I golf while I’m down there.
Every once in awhile in Brooklyn, I go out to Flatbush, to Reid Park.
I actually had a hole-in-one in Brooklyn two years ago.
Bryan was also involved with Day of the Dead, a charity tribute album to the Grateful Dead released by 4AD on May 20, 2016.
